class.name: WilcoxonSignedRankTestTest

javadoc.text: Test cases for the WilcoxonSignedRangTest class.

method.name: testWilcoxonSignedRankSimple
method.comment:
EXACT: wilcox.test(x, y, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 0, paired = TRUE, exact = TRUE, correct = FALSE) V = 40, p-value = 0.03906
Corresponds to the value obtained in R.

ASYMPTOTIC: wilcox.test(x, y, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 0, paired = TRUE, exact = FALSE, correct = FALSE) V = 40, p-value = 0.03815
This is not entirely the same due to different corrects, e.g. http:mlsc.lboro.ac.ukresourcesstatisticswsrt.pdf and srclibrarystatsRwilcox.test.R in the R source

method.name: testWilcoxonSignedRankInputValidation
method.comment: Samples must be present, i.e. length > 0
Samples not same size, i.e. cannot be pairred
